at.qe.timeguess.gamelogic

Class Dice

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.qe.timeguess.gamelogic.Dice

  • public class Dice
extends Object
    Class that holds the dice mapping for a running game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dice()
      Default constructor that initializes the dice with the default mapping.
      Dice(int[] pointsMapping, String[] activityMapping, int[] durationMapping)
      Constructor that initializes the dice with a given mapping.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dice

        public Dice()
        Default constructor that initializes the dice with the default mapping.

      • Dice

        public Dice(int[] pointsMapping,
            String[] activityMapping,
            int[] durationMapping)
        Constructor that initializes the dice with a given mapping. All arrays provided need to be in of size 12
        Parameters:
        pointsMapping - array that maps facet to points
        activityMapping - array that maps facet to activity.
        durationMapping - array that maps facet to duration.
